post.description: Submits a payload to be persisted to the database

get.summary: Return this API document in JSON format

200.description: The API document for this version of the API

cpus.description: Number of cpus of the entity (vcpus for virtualized, cpus for baremetal).

disk_count.description: Total count of disks. Total storage capacity of the entity is: disk_size * disk_count.

disk_size.description: Size of one local disk in bytes. Total storage capacity of the entity is: disk_size * disk_count.

extra.description: Free form document for storing SourceType's specific attributes.

resource_timestamp.description: Timestamp marking age of the data.

external_url.description: URL of the service instance in the external source (OpenShift, Azure, AWS, ...).

host_inventory_uuid.description: UUID of the host in host inventory

mac_addresses.description: Array of all MAC addresses of this Vm
